text: Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar gum Sipsivar Ŋgugar Muuŋ, mani khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu zɨ!” Mba buni mbararagi gumgi, mbe vhɨra khaŋ suaŋ, “Ndu zɨ!” Maaŋgi guma, ana fhɨr khigi, ana zɨ. Guma fhɨr khigip, mbɨr mbɨr saŋv ana zɨv, ana zazera mbarara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ ndi ndɨɨi mbɨ, ana anan mbɨri. Fhe Bakɨme fhura ana ndi ndɨɨi.
